column5: Hey Everyone , I decided to venture out tonight at about 8 oclock down to "the spot" lol and finally at 8:20 i had a big hit something real feisty was pulling the drag was making that sweet sound when you have something decent on but alas 10 feet away from me the bugger got off! I though dang that was sweet since i wasnt expecting anything and i nearly made the decision to go home and call it a night! Good thing i didnt because just as the sun was setting i put a on a different lure and sure enough wham! The third pickeral ive ever caught and it was visually a new pb! Well looking at the pics now i realize the fish looks a lot happier then me .....! Anyways thought id share the pics, enjoy!!       Jason
well done!      You GOTTA through a couple other lures in after losing one!
Woo hoo!! Great fish!  You've put the legwork in and it's paid off....congrats!
WTG Man third eye ever eh there will be many more to come
